idea-plugin.name: Cucumber Scenarios Indexer
idea-plugin.description: A little plugin which updates your Cucumber feature files with indexes for scenarios </br> E.g. before: </br> Scenario: testing requirement #345 </br> Scenario Outline: testing requirement #123 </br> </br> after: </br> Scenario: 01 - testing requirement #345 </br> Scenario Outline: 02 - testing requirement #123 </br> </br> OR </br> before: </br> Scenario: 01 - testing requirement #345 </br> Scenario Outline: 02 - testing requirement #123 </br> Scenario: 01 - testing requirement #345 </br> Scenario Outline: 02 - testing requirement #123 </br> </br> after: </br> Scenario: 01 - testing requirement #345 </br> Scenario Outline: 02 - testing requirement #123 </br> Scenario: 03 - testing requirement #345 </br> Scenario Outline: 04 - testing requirement #123 </br> </br> Works from the context menu in a project files tree - will change a *.feature file or all the *.feature files in a directory and all the subdirectories
